channel.title: Bank Buttons
channel.description: Okay, So I made a new bank interface, and all that good stuff. BUT when I click the note/unote button I can't un note items and the only way to fix it is by relogging, so does anyone know how to make it so when I click the note button it get's replaced with a new button that switches it back to Unoted.

item.title: Bank Buttons
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Okay, So I made a new bank interface, and all that good stuff.
BUT when I click the note/unote button I can’t un note items and the only way to fix it is by relogging, so does anyone know how to make it so when I click the note button it get’s replaced with a new button that switches it back to Unoted.

Read full topic
